doc.title: Half-Dressed for Dinner
doc.plot: In this edition of RKO's "Newlywed" series, with Robert Hutton and Elizabeth Frazer replacing Robert Neil and Suzi Crandall from the earlier entries, the Newlyweds are forced to entertain a rich uncle at an expensive club, even though they are broke. They borrow enough money from a butcher and a relative to pay for the meal, and Betty makes a dress from the curtains (following Vivian Leigh and ahead of Carol Burnett) but, while dancing, the dress falls apart.
